abstract: The German software company seems poised to take on Alibaba by offering business services and software through a cloud-computing marketplace.
snippet: The German software company seems poised to take on Alibaba by offering business services and software through a cloud-computing marketplace.
lead_paragraph: SAP, one of the world’s largest makers of software for business, is readying an ambitious plan to build a global marketplace for business products and services, according to senior company executives.

headline.main: SAP Readies a Big Business Marketplace
